Name: Combat Mech VR
About the game: Combat Mech VR is a casual VR shooter inspired by Mecha Animes. Made for fans who love playing with action figures: piloting a robot as if you are playing with an action figure; shoot or blast your way through enemy robots and spaceships all the actions takes place inside the roomscale area. No locomotion is needed simple control scheme. Only requires one controller to play
Meta Title: Combat Mech VR: Aug 25, 2020, Chun Y. and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Combat Mech VR? Check out the release date (Aug 25, 2020), developer insights from Chun Y., and a complete game summary.
